Package appeng.api

@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault package appeng.api
Gameplay API for Applied Energistics 2.

Most of the classes that are reachable via this interface can only be used once a world has been loaded.

The AE2 API should be available as soon as your mod starts initializing.

For registering your content with AE2, see the following classes, which are thread-safe and can be used within your mods constructor:

  • AEKeyTypes
  • GridServices
  • BlockEntityMoveStrategies
  • GridLinkables
  • StorageCells
  • Locatables
  • PartModels
  • P2PTunnelAttunement
  • StorageCellModels

In addition, the following helpers are available for interacting with AE2 mechanics once in-game:

  • PatternDetailsHelper
  • GridHelper
  • StorageHelper
  • PartHelper
  • Related Packages

    Classes to allow addons to define behavior of AE2's own devices when they have to interact with custom key types.

  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    IAEAddonEntrypoint
    If your addons needs to be notified when AE2 is fully initialized (and has registered all of its items and fluids), implement this class and register it as an entrypoint in your mod.
